shortdesc.ph: Used to configure parameters for screen capture.

plentry.pd:
Whether to capture a window on the screen:
: Capture a window.
: (Default) Capture the entire screen instead of a window.
Display ID of the screen. This parameter is effective only when capturing the screen on macOS.
Position of the shared screen relative to the virtual screen. See . This parameter is effective only when capturing the screen on Windows.
Window ID. This parameter is effective only when capturing a window.

Position of the shared region relative to the entire screen. See . If this parameter is not set, the SDK shares the entire screen. If the specified region exceeds the screen boundaries, only the portion within the screen is shared. If the width or height in is set to 0, the entire screen is shared.
